series.title: 8 Minute Millionaire: Learn the Secrets of Millionaire Entrepreneurs
series.author: Justin and Tara Williams

episodes.seriesTitle: 8 Minute Millionaire: Learn the Secrets of Millionaire Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: 153: What in the World Happened to Justin and Tara?! Find Out…
episodes.summary: If you’ve been wondering “What in the world happened to Justin and Tara?!” then you’re in luck… because we’re back with some wild stories to tell!

episodes.seriesTitle: 8 Minute Millionaire: Learn the Secrets of Millionaire Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: 152: The One “Nasty Email” That Could Have Ruined Everything…
episodes.summary: So, Tara got a nasty email the other day… which led to an interesting turn of events.  Let me explain…

episodes.seriesTitle: 8 Minute Millionaire: Learn the Secrets of Millionaire Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: 151: Tara Goes All In… and Launches CONNECT ACADEMY!
episodes.summary: If you’ve been keeping up with 8 minute Millionaire for a while, you’ve heard Tara’s story. You know the journey she’s been on… and today, that journey is taking a crazy-awesome new turn!

episodes.seriesTitle: 8 Minute Millionaire: Learn the Secrets of Millionaire Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: 150: How to Grow Your Business Using Facebook Live: Interview With Bedros Keuilian (Part 3)
episodes.summary: Facebook Live is a great way to reach your audience, grow your list, drive sales, and expand your business… but ONLY if you do it the right way…

episodes.seriesTitle: 8 Minute Millionaire: Learn the Secrets of Millionaire Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: 149: How to “Infinitely Scale” Your Mastermind Group: Interview With Bedros Keuilian (Part 2)
episodes.summary: Bedros breaks down his more than 10 years of experience coaching mastermind group and shows exactly how he runs his programs to make them “infinitely scalable…” check it out!

episodes.seriesTitle: 8 Minute Millionaire: Learn the Secrets of Millionaire Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: 148: From Communist Russia to Millionaire Entrepreneur: Interview With Bedros Keuilian (Part 1)
episodes.summary: The next 20 minutes will completely change your life... I’m not kidding.

episodes.seriesTitle: 8 Minute Millionaire: Learn the Secrets of Millionaire Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: 147: Flip Hacking LIVE Recap! (It Was AWESOME… I’m Still in Shock!)
episodes.summary: We just finished up Flip Hacking LIVE this past weekend, and right before that, we held our 7 Figure Flipping mastermind meeting… and let’s just say things have been amazing!

episodes.seriesTitle: 8 Minute Millionaire: Learn the Secrets of Millionaire Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: 146: Business Is Personal: It Changes You (If You’re Willing to Put in the Work)
episodes.summary: Hey everyone!  It’s been awhile… but we’re jumping on to give you an update on what’s been going on and what’s in store for the future!

episodes.seriesTitle: 8 Minute Millionaire: Learn the Secrets of Millionaire Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: 145: Find the “One Thing” That Matters (And Do It)
episodes.summary: Sometimes we try to do too much.  And because we try to do too much, we miss the target on what really matters…

episodes.seriesTitle: 8 Minute Millionaire: Learn the Secrets of Millionaire Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: 144: Why You Should Raise Your Prices (Especially If You Want to Help People)
episodes.summary: Raising prices is hard.  We don’t seem to like doing it… and yet the impact it can have is huge. And no, I’m not just talking about making more money.  There’s a lot more to it than that…

episodes.seriesTitle: 8 Minute Millionaire: Learn the Secrets of Millionaire Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: 143: This “Hack” Can 10X Your Productivity (And Make You Happier) in Just 15 Minutes a Day: Interview With Craig Ballantyne
episodes.summary: If I told you that you could 10X your productivity, get more done, feel better about yourself and your work, and spend more time with your family doing what you love, all by setting aside just 15 minutes of your morning… would you want to know how?

episodes.seriesTitle: 8 Minute Millionaire: Learn the Secrets of Millionaire Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: 142: Too Many Ideas? How to Focus On (and Commit to) the Right One
episodes.summary: Have you ever had too many ideas for your business and you’re not sure which one you should pursue? Or you’re feeling pulled in all directions but you’re not making much progress, because you’re trying to do too many things?

episodes.seriesTitle: 8 Minute Millionaire: Learn the Secrets of Millionaire Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: 141: “I’ve Done It!” Tara Officially Launches the Energy Healing Podcast!
episodes.summary: Hey everyone!   :)  Tara here.  I have an awesome announcement to make… I’ve officially launched a new podcast for my energy healing business, The Energy Healing Podcast With Tara Williams!

episodes.seriesTitle: 8 Minute Millionaire: Learn the Secrets of Millionaire Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: 140: Pushing Through the Weeds: What to Do When Your Dream Stalls
episodes.summary: Justin here.   :)  Today’s episode is kind of a big update on everything that’s been going on recently with Tara and I and our online businesses… and trust me, there’s been a lot going on!

episodes.seriesTitle: 8 Minute Millionaire: Learn the Secrets of Millionaire Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: 139: Jenny Has Some Big News (And You Might Not Like It)
episodes.summary: Jenny sent me a message and said, “I have some big news, and I’m not sure if you’re going to like it.” Turns out she was about to drop a huge bomb on me… let’s just say Jenny’s entrepreneurial journey is going to be taking a VERY different path!

episodes.seriesTitle: 8 Minute Millionaire: Learn the Secrets of Millionaire Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: 138: “What Now?” Jenny Looks for Advice on What’s Next for Her Business…
episodes.summary: A couple weeks ago, we had our very first 8 Minute Millionaire Mastermind meeting, and at the event, Jenny shared where’s she at in her business.   The advice she got from the group has had a huge impact on her business…

episodes.seriesTitle: 8 Minute Millionaire: Learn the Secrets of Millionaire Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: 137: How 100 X’s Will Change Your Life: Gamify Your Success
episodes.summary: I want to introduce you to something I call the “100 X challenge.”  If you can complete this challenge, you’ll be well on your way to success.  But most people don’t complete it.  And the reason why is very simple…

episodes.seriesTitle: 8 Minute Millionaire: Learn the Secrets of Millionaire Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: 136: How to Start Your Own Agency in the Next 20 Hours (And Why You Should)
episodes.summary: In today’s episode, you’ll find out why agencies are some of the simplest businesses to launch, and how you can use an agency model to quickly build recurring revenue… check it out!

episodes.seriesTitle: 8 Minute Millionaire: Learn the Secrets of Millionaire Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: 135: Unpacking Justin’s Anxiety: “Who Am I?”
episodes.summary: Tara here.   :)  I’ve shared plenty of my innermost secrets on this podcast… and today, it’s Justin’s turn to put himself out there!  What Justin is going through is something many entrepreneurs and business owners go through…

episodes.seriesTitle: 8 Minute Millionaire: Learn the Secrets of Millionaire Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: 134: Why You Need to Fail Fast: Failure Gives You REAL Data
episodes.summary: Nobody wants to fail.  But the simple truth is that “failing” at something is one of the ONLY ways to gain the exact information you need to know to move forward to success.  But what kind of failure are we talking about here?

episodes.seriesTitle: 8 Minute Millionaire: Learn the Secrets of Millionaire Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: 133: How 1 Tiny Thing Can COMPLETELY Change Your Business: 8MM Mastermind Recap
episodes.summary: Justin here.  Tara and I just wrapped up our very first 8 Minute Millionaire Mastermind meeting… and it was amazing!  Everyone was completely transformed by this event… and in today’s episode, we recap some of the big takeaways!

episodes.seriesTitle: 8 Minute Millionaire: Learn the Secrets of Millionaire Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: 132: How to Make Miracles Happen (This Really Works… Try It!)
episodes.summary: Last night, I had a “miracle” happen to me… okay, maybe it wasn’t literally a miracle, but it was honestly pretty miraculous and I definitely didn’t see it coming.  And it got me thinking… what role do we play in making “miracles” happen?

episodes.seriesTitle: 8 Minute Millionaire: Learn the Secrets of Millionaire Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: 131: Discernment, Intuition, and Developing Your Gift
episodes.summary: Tara and I went for a run early in the morning the other day, and as we were running, Tara starting sharing some awesome stuff about intuition, discernment, and how struggles help us develop our strengths… check it out!

episodes.seriesTitle: 8 Minute Millionaire: Learn the Secrets of Millionaire Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: 130: Jenny Launches Her Website (And Gets Some NEGATIVE Feedback…?)
episodes.summary: Jenny just officially launched her website, EmerlynVance.com!  And that means it’s time for a celebration! But hang on… not everyone’s happy…

episodes.seriesTitle: 8 Minute Millionaire: Learn the Secrets of Millionaire Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: 129: $81,377 in 10 Days: Dissecting Our Recent Product Launch
episodes.summary: We just finished “launching” our House Flipping Formula training program, and today, we’re looking back on that launch and seeing how we did. Some things went well. Other things didn’t…

episodes.seriesTitle: 8 Minute Millionaire: Learn the Secrets of Millionaire Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: 128: Why the Fear of “What If” Cripples So Many Entrepreneurs (And How Jenny Pushed Past It)
episodes.summary: When we left off from Jenny’s story last week, Jenny needed to sell some products… badly.  And she needed to start hustling. So, threw a big open house party to showcase her products… and here’s what happened…

episodes.seriesTitle: 8 Minute Millionaire: Learn the Secrets of Millionaire Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: 127: 3 Essential Success Tactics for Building (Or Buying) an Online Business
episodes.summary: There are 3 key tactics every entrepreneur should employ when launching or growing an online business… and today, we’re joined again by the incredible Drew Sanocki, who shares these 3 concepts and why they’re important!

episodes.seriesTitle: 8 Minute Millionaire: Learn the Secrets of Millionaire Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: 126: Why Disagreements Are Important: Going Behind the Scenes of 8 Minute Millionaire…
episodes.summary: Justin here.  Recently, I put together an outline for a video course that I thought was awesome… but Tara didn’t really like it very much.  It led to an interesting discussion…

episodes.seriesTitle: 8 Minute Millionaire: Learn the Secrets of Millionaire Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: 125: 3 Mindset Hacks All Entrepreneurs Need to Know: Interview With Drew Sanocki
episodes.summary: There are 3 “mindset” hacks that all entrepreneurs need in order to succeed… and in today’s interview, ecommerce expert Drew Sanocki shares exactly what they are!

episodes.seriesTitle: 8 Minute Millionaire: Learn the Secrets of Millionaire Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: 124: Jenny Gets Into “Hustle Mode” (And Gets Her First Sale)
episodes.summary: That’s right… Jenny just got her first sale! But she’s going to need to move a lot more product to get this business off the ground… how is she planning to do that? Listen in to find out…

episodes.seriesTitle: 8 Minute Millionaire: Learn the Secrets of Millionaire Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: 123: Be Still: How Learning to Be Present Can Change Everything
episodes.summary: Justin here.  I think Tara has a gift for learning and sharing, for growth and development, and for helping others do the same.  Today, Tara shares some of the amazing things she’s learned and experienced on her ongoing journey of personal growth.

episodes.seriesTitle: 8 Minute Millionaire: Learn the Secrets of Millionaire Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: 122: Overcoming Fear, Part 3: Breakthrough Call with Lain
episodes.summary: Justin here. Tara and I both know Lain from the advanced mastermind we’re part of with Russell Brunson. Lain is an awesome guy, and in today’s episode, he and Tara have some powerful stuff to talk about…

episodes.seriesTitle: 8 Minute Millionaire: Learn the Secrets of Millionaire Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: 121: Why Suffering Is Important (And How it Equips Us to Help Others)
episodes.summary: Three weeks ago, Tara was going through a little bit of a struggle.  It took her a few days before she came to talk to me about it, but I’m glad she did.  We try to be very real and open here on this podcast, and we want you to see what goes on…

episodes.seriesTitle: 8 Minute Millionaire: Learn the Secrets of Millionaire Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: 120: Working With Your Spouse? Keep These Things in Mind…
episodes.summary: Justin here.  Today, Tara and I are going on a little lunch date… and we’re talking about relationships! Specifically, marriage… and what it’s like to work with your spouse. Here’s what we’ve learned…

episodes.seriesTitle: 8 Minute Millionaire: Learn the Secrets of Millionaire Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: 119: Passion, Skill, and Demand (You Need All 3): Interview With Jeff Goins
episodes.summary: Not only did Jeff Goins build an email list of over 100,000 subscribers in just 18 months, he’s also a hugely successful author, entrepreneur, and marketing expert! Listen in as he shares his story!

episodes.seriesTitle: 8 Minute Millionaire: Learn the Secrets of Millionaire Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: 118: Overcoming Fear, Part 2: Breakthrough Call with Kat
episodes.summary: Kat just quit her job the day before this call… and she’s excited and happy and scary and worried all at once. Listen in as Tara works with Kat to understand and overcome her fear!

episodes.seriesTitle: 8 Minute Millionaire: Learn the Secrets of Millionaire Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: 117: Excited, Exhausted, and Emotional: Jenny’s Weird Breakdown
episodes.summary: Jenny just had the “weirdest experience…” after working on her business for hours on a Saturday, she was feeling pretty exhausted… and she had a bit of a breakdown… but it wasn’t like anything she had experienced before.

episodes.seriesTitle: 8 Minute Millionaire: Learn the Secrets of Millionaire Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: 116: How to Launch Your Business With No Audience and No Product: The Collaboration Strategy
episodes.summary: We’re back again with Tom Morkes… and if you want to learn how to build massive traction in your business, whether you’re just getting started or you’ve been building your audience for a while, this episode is for you!

episodes.seriesTitle: 8 Minute Millionaire: Learn the Secrets of Millionaire Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: 115: What You Need to Know BEFORE You Start Working From Home
episodes.summary: Let’s talk about working from home… is it super awesome?  Or is it kind of difficult, with all the distractions that can come up?  Is it better or worse for your family?  What about your social life?

episodes.seriesTitle: 8 Minute Millionaire: Learn the Secrets of Millionaire Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: 114: Writing, Art, and Entrepreneurship: Interview with Tom Morkes
episodes.summary: Justin here.  Today, I have an awesome guest I want you to meet… and what he has to share could help you gain massive amounts of traction for your business!

episodes.seriesTitle: 8 Minute Millionaire: Learn the Secrets of Millionaire Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: 113: Overcoming Fear, Part 1: Breakthrough Call with Emily
episodes.summary: Justin here.   :)  Last week, Tara held an incredible group call with some of our Millionaire University students.  The topic of the call?  Overcoming fear… and today, we’re sharing part 1 of that call with you!

episodes.seriesTitle: 8 Minute Millionaire: Learn the Secrets of Millionaire Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: 112: The Power of Exercise: Why Entrepreneurs Do It
episodes.summary: Tara here! Exercise is extremely important to me… but that wasn’t always the case. There’s a reason why I can’t live without it now, though… listen in to this episode and find out why!

episodes.seriesTitle: 8 Minute Millionaire: Learn the Secrets of Millionaire Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: 111: The 3 Phases of Entrepreneurship (And Why They Matter)
episodes.summary: There are 3 distinct phases every entrepreneur goes through when starting a business. But sometimes we get stuck in just one phase and never move to the next one!

episodes.seriesTitle: 8 Minute Millionaire: Learn the Secrets of Millionaire Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: 110: Are You Blaming Others for Your Situation?
episodes.summary: Tara here.   :)  Over the years as Justin and I have started and run businesses, I’ve often found myself working in roles that didn’t really excite me… and I’ve always felt a bit frustrated and irritated by that…

episodes.seriesTitle: 8 Minute Millionaire: Learn the Secrets of Millionaire Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: 109: Jenny Fails Forward Fast: “I Have to Sell These, NOW…”
episodes.summary: Today, we catch up with Jenny and check in on how her business is going!  Turns out she is already failing forward fast and figuring things out… she’s being “forced” to think on her feet, make changes, and learn to accept imperfection!

episodes.seriesTitle: 8 Minute Millionaire: Learn the Secrets of Millionaire Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: 108: Are You a Pre-Freaker or a Post-Freaker? (It’s Important!)
episodes.summary: Justin here.   :)  Tara and I were sitting here trying to figure out what’s next for Millionaire University… but as it turns out, Tara and I have very different ways of approaching things! Listen in and you’ll see what I mean…

episodes.seriesTitle: 8 Minute Millionaire: Learn the Secrets of Millionaire Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: 107: How to Get Good at Selling (Even if You’re Shy)
episodes.summary: If you’re shy and you don’t like speaking in front of others, you may feel like you don’t have what it takes to be good at sales. But it turns out that’s completely untrue!

episodes.seriesTitle: 8 Minute Millionaire: Learn the Secrets of Millionaire Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: 106: The “Octopus” Marketing Strategy: How Jill Stanton Grows Her Business Like Clockwork
episodes.summary: In this episode, Jill Stanton outlines the EXACT marketing strategy she and Josh “live by” to build their online business… and you do NOT want to miss it!

episodes.seriesTitle: 8 Minute Millionaire: Learn the Secrets of Millionaire Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: 105: It's Not Easy... But It's Not as Hard as You Think!
episodes.summary: Hey everyone! We just finished up an awesome marketing mastermind here in Boise, Idaho... and we have some incredible takeaways to share with you!

episodes.seriesTitle: 8 Minute Millionaire: Learn the Secrets of Millionaire Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: 104: Screw the 9-to-5: Interview With Jill Stanton, Serial Web Entrepreneur
episodes.summary: Ready to escape your 9-to-5 job and achieve financial and personal freedom? In this episode, we're joined by Jill Stanton, co-founder of Screw the Nine to Five.. who has some AWESOME advice for aspiring entrepreneurs!

episodes.seriesTitle: 8 Minute Millionaire: Learn the Secrets of Millionaire Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: 103: “Nobody Knows Everything:” Derrick and Justin Face Off About Mentoring Jenny
episodes.summary: In this episode, Justin and Derrick get on a call to work out their disagreements regarding Jenny... but these guys can both be very stubborn and opinionated. What's going to happen?!

episodes.seriesTitle: 8 Minute Millionaire: Learn the Secrets of Millionaire Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: 102: How We Launched Millionaire University: A Raw, Real, Inside Look!
episodes.summary: In today’s episode, we give you a totally raw inside look at how we launched Millionaire University, day by day… what happened, what went wrong, and what went right!

episodes.seriesTitle: 8 Minute Millionaire: Learn the Secrets of Millionaire Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: 101: Up-and-Coming Millionaire: Kirsten Tyrrel, Action-Taking Entrepreneur Extraordinaire!
episodes.summary: Kirsten and her husband Ben started on an incredible journey of learning and action-taking just a couple months ago… and what they’ve accomplished already is just incredible!

episodes.seriesTitle: 8 Minute Millionaire: Learn the Secrets of Millionaire Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: 100: “I’m So Scared Right Now:” Jenny Heads to the LA Fashion District!
episodes.summary: In today’s episode, Jenny heads up to the Los Angeles fashion district to find some cute clothes at wholesale prices… and it’s a big, exciting, scary adventure!

episodes.seriesTitle: 8 Minute Millionaire: Learn the Secrets of Millionaire Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: 99: Happy New Year: Our BIG Plans for 2016!
episodes.summary: 2015 was a wild and awesome and great… many ups, a few downs, but just an incredible ride overall!  Now, we’re super excited for 2016… some big things happening this year!

episodes.seriesTitle: 8 Minute Millionaire: Learn the Secrets of Millionaire Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: 98: Millionaire Interview: Josh Elledge, Publicity Expert and Founder of SavingsAngel.com
episodes.summary: Today’s guest on the podcast is Josh Elledge, who is truly a publicity ninja.  Josh has a ton of awesome tips and tricks to share on marketing, free PR, and how to bring more customers to your business… without spending money on advertising!

episodes.seriesTitle: 8 Minute Millionaire: Learn the Secrets of Millionaire Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: 97: Finding What You Love Most: Followup Session With Erin
episodes.summary: Erin joined us on Episode 87 for a breakthrough session, and I gave her a challenge to define her focus and the direction she wants to go. Today, we’re checking in to see where she’s at and figure out her next steps!

episodes.seriesTitle: 8 Minute Millionaire: Learn the Secrets of Millionaire Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: 96: Jenny Struggles to Find Her Target Market (And Derrick Starts to Get Frustrated)
episodes.summary: It turns out Jenny is really struggling to figure out some of the core things she needs to know to run a successful business… like who her target market is and what products she’s going to sell.  And Derrick is starting to get frustrated…

episodes.seriesTitle: 8 Minute Millionaire: Learn the Secrets of Millionaire Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: 95: How Millionaires Come Up With Killer Business Ideas
episodes.summary: You may have noticed that a lot of the millionaires we’ve interviewed came up with their “killer” business ideas in the same way… and in this episode, we dive into how they do it!

episodes.seriesTitle: 8 Minute Millionaire: Learn the Secrets of Millionaire Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: 94: How to Recover From a “Business Temper Tantrum” (And Why They Happen!)
episodes.summary: What do you do when you have a business tempter tantrum... or when someone you're working with has one? We tackle that today! Plus, we share some big news about Millionaire University!

episodes.seriesTitle: 8 Minute Millionaire: Learn the Secrets of Millionaire Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: 93: Vera’s Christmas Surprise: $1,000,000 in 8 Minutes!
episodes.summary: So, we have a friend. She calls herself Vera. And she’s hilarious. (Is she real? Or is she a figment of someone’s imagination? Hmm…) As a special Christmas surprise, Vera gets to learn how to make a million dollars in 8 minutes!

episodes.seriesTitle: 8 Minute Millionaire: Learn the Secrets of Millionaire Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: 92: Batching: How to Get Things Done Without Losing Your Mind
episodes.summary: When we first started creating episodes for this podcast, it felt like a lot of work… and we started to get stressed out. But by “batching” tasks, we’re now more efficient and we have a lot more fun!

episodes.seriesTitle: 8 Minute Millionaire: Learn the Secrets of Millionaire Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: 91: “Stick Up For Yourself:” Is Derrick Turning Jenny Against Justin?!
episodes.summary: Justin here.  :)  Last week, we found out Derrick is going to be helping Jenny launch her business, which is great! But then the two of them had an interesting meeting… and I’m not sure how to feel about it…

episodes.seriesTitle: 8 Minute Millionaire: Learn the Secrets of Millionaire Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: 90: Is Starting a Business Easy or Hard?
episodes.summary: Today we tackle the million dollar question… is starting a business easy or hard? What do you think?  Your answer to this question is VERY important…

episodes.seriesTitle: 8 Minute Millionaire: Learn the Secrets of Millionaire Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: 89: When to Take a “Mental” Vacation (And Why You Should)
episodes.summary: In today’s episode, we’re headed to the gym… to relax!   :)  Yep, that’s right… when we need a break, it’s gym time! Today, we talk a bit about “mental vacations” and why they’re important to entrepreneurs…

episodes.seriesTitle: 8 Minute Millionaire: Learn the Secrets of Millionaire Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: 88: Millionaire Interview: Mike Hardenbrook, Founder of GrowthHacker.TV and GrowthGeeks.com
episodes.summary: If you feel like you don’t have a product yet, or that your product isn’t “ready” to be launched… then you need to listen to this interview with Mike Hardenbrook! What he has to say might just surprise you…

episodes.seriesTitle: 8 Minute Millionaire: Learn the Secrets of Millionaire Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: 87: Do What Makes You Feel Alive: Breakthrough Session with Erin
episodes.summary: Erin is feeling a bit stuck in her job.  She enjoys teaching, but teaching the way she is at the moment isn’t very fulfilling for her… and she has other passions and talents as well. So what’s next for her… and how can she figure it out?

episodes.seriesTitle: 8 Minute Millionaire: Learn the Secrets of Millionaire Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: 86: BOOM! Jenny Starts a Business (And Gets it FUNDED?!)
episodes.summary: Today’s episode marks what is perhaps the biggest turning point in Jenny’s journey so far… despite “slipping” back into some old habits, she’s made some awesome things happen in the past couple weeks!

episodes.seriesTitle: 8 Minute Millionaire: Learn the Secrets of Millionaire Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: 85: You Have a DUTY to Be Successful (And Here’s Why)
episodes.summary: Time to get real. Time to talk about your mindset… specifically, your mindset when it comes to being successful. Unless you feel that being successful is a duty, an obligation, a MUST, then it’s not going to happen for you…

episodes.seriesTitle: 8 Minute Millionaire: Learn the Secrets of Millionaire Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: 84: Why We’re Hiring a Personal Assistant (And Why You Should, Too)
episodes.summary: We’re in the final stages of hiring a personal assistant to help us with all kinds of things. Why are we hiring a personal assistant?  For a very important reason… and in today’s episode, we dive into what that reason is!

episodes.seriesTitle: 8 Minute Millionaire: Learn the Secrets of Millionaire Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: 83: Millionaire Interview: Greg Rollett, Marketing Expert & Founder of Ambitious.com
episodes.summary: Greg has some SERIOUS hustle. He runs media companies, oversees marketing campaigns for huge brands and celebrities, is one of the top experts on connecting with Millennials… and today, he’s sharing a WEALTH of insights for entrepreneurs!

episodes.seriesTitle: 8 Minute Millionaire: Learn the Secrets of Millionaire Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: 82: Starting a Business but Can’t Quit Your Job Yet? Here’s What to Do…
episodes.summary: We recently got an email from a woman who wants to take the plunge and start a business, but she can’t quit her “day job” yet… and she doesn’t want to get fired while she focuses on her new venture. What should she do?

episodes.seriesTitle: 8 Minute Millionaire: Learn the Secrets of Millionaire Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: 81: Jenny Hits the Snooze Button
episodes.summary: Will Jenny be able to find the willpower to stick with the new habits she’s been working on now that she’s no longer being held accountable every minute of the day? Time will tell…

episodes.seriesTitle: 8 Minute Millionaire: Learn the Secrets of Millionaire Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: 80: How “Haters” Can Help Your Business (And Why You Need Them)
episodes.summary: It turns out haters are every important… and if you DON’T have any yet, you’re doing something wrong. So, how should you handle haters… and how do they “help” you?

episodes.seriesTitle: 8 Minute Millionaire: Learn the Secrets of Millionaire Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: 79: Introducing MILLIONAIRE UNIVERSITY! (Yes, it’s Happening!)
episodes.summary: Tara here.   :)  It’s been a great week!  A lot has happened… and today, we have a HUGE and very exciting announcement…  Introducing… the official launch of MILLIONAIRE UNIVERSITY!

episodes.seriesTitle: 8 Minute Millionaire: Learn the Secrets of Millionaire Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: 78: Millionaire Interview: Drew Canole, Health & Fitness Guru and Founder of FitLife.tv
episodes.summary: Drew Canole is the founder of FitLife.tv … and he’s here today to share his story and how he launched a business doing what he loves and built an audience of over 2.5 million followers in less than 3 years!

episodes.seriesTitle: 8 Minute Millionaire: Learn the Secrets of Millionaire Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: 77: How to Use Your Passion to Change the World: Interview With Yanik Silver
episodes.summary: Serial entrepreneur Yanik Silver shares how doing what you love and achieving a meaningful impact with your work doesn’t have to get in the way of making a profit… in fact, focusing on your “mission” first can increase profits!

episodes.seriesTitle: 8 Minute Millionaire: Learn the Secrets of Millionaire Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: 76: Jenny Breaks Free… and Starts Preparing to Launch Her Own Business!
episodes.summary: Last week, Jenny went through a rough patch… so we decided to have a meeting with her to go over where we’re at and what’s going to happen next. And let’s just say there are some exciting things in store!

episodes.seriesTitle: 8 Minute Millionaire: Learn the Secrets of Millionaire Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: 75: How to Find your Target Customers (And Much More): Interview With Ryan Kulp
episodes.summary: As an established marketing expert, growth hacker, and entrepreneur, Ryan knows a thing or two about how to drive customers to a business… and it all starts with asking two very important questions!

episodes.seriesTitle: 8 Minute Millionaire: Learn the Secrets of Millionaire Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: 74: Why You Should Give Yourself EXTREMELY Short Deadlines (Even for Huge Projects)
episodes.summary: It’s amazing what can happen in just a few days… or in just a single hour!  When we give ourselves tight deadlines, we can achieve things we never thought possible…

episodes.seriesTitle: 8 Minute Millionaire: Learn the Secrets of Millionaire Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: 73: Millionaire Interview: Grant Cardone, Bestselling Author, Entrepreneur, and Business Expert
episodes.summary: In today’s episode, entrepreneur, real estate investor, author, and speaker Grant Cardone breaks down the truth about money… and how our beliefs and thoughts about it can completely shape whether we succeed or fail in business!

episodes.seriesTitle: 8 Minute Millionaire: Learn the Secrets of Millionaire Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: 72: Impostor Syndrome: Let Go of Fear (And Just Be Yourself)
episodes.summary: Tara here! Last week, I found myself facing another breaking point… a moment where I just felt completely overcome by fear and didn’t know how to move forward. Turns out I’ve been battling something called impostor syndrome…

episodes.seriesTitle: 8 Minute Millionaire: Learn the Secrets of Millionaire Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: 71: “Is It Worth It?” Jenny Breaks Up with Her Boyfriend, Runs Out of Money, and Kind of Falls Apart
episodes.summary: Let’s just say it’s been a rough week for Jenny… and she’s maybe hit her lowest point yet.  Becoming a millionaire is going to take way more sacrifice than she had imagined… and she finds herself asking, “Is it worth it?”

episodes.seriesTitle: 8 Minute Millionaire: Learn the Secrets of Millionaire Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: 70: Launch Your Business in 7 Days: Interview with Justin Mares
episodes.summary: We recently had an awesome interview with successful entrepreneur Justin Mares… and he unloaded a TON of incredible marketing and business growth insights on us!

episodes.seriesTitle: 8 Minute Millionaire: Learn the Secrets of Millionaire Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: 69: We Hate What We Do (And You Should, Too)
episodes.summary: If your entire goals is to just “do what you love” without doing anything you don’t love, you’re not going to be successful.  Not AT ALL.

episodes.seriesTitle: 8 Minute Millionaire: Learn the Secrets of Millionaire Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: 68: Millionaire Interview: Melanie Duncan, Entrepreneur, Designer, Philosopher, and World-Traveler
episodes.summary: Melanie started her first multimillion-dollar business in college and has launched and run several more since then… and in the midst of it all, she travels the world and works from wherever she wants!

episodes.seriesTitle: 8 Minute Millionaire: Learn the Secrets of Millionaire Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: 67: How to Overcome Fear: Make a Salad
episodes.summary: Tara here! A few years ago, I got very sick. I almost didn’t make it through. For a long time, I found myself wondering if the rest of my life was just going to be like this. But something happened within me that helped me overcome…

episodes.seriesTitle: 8 Minute Millionaire: Learn the Secrets of Millionaire Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: 66: Can Jenny Run a Half Marathon… Without Stopping? Let’s Find Out…
episodes.summary: After last week, Jenny has really started “showing up” in all aspects of life… including running. In fact, the running was going well enough that she decided to try something crazy… something we weren’t sure she was ready for!

episodes.seriesTitle: 8 Minute Millionaire: Learn the Secrets of Millionaire Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: 65: How to Easily Build a Website (In Just a Few Minutes)
episodes.summary: Justin here.  If you’re running an online business, you might just need a website… and for today’s episode, Tara and I decided we should walk you through how to set one up step by step... with the help of our very own tech ninja, Kyle Chezum!

episodes.seriesTitle: 8 Minute Millionaire: Learn the Secrets of Millionaire Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: 64: How We Made $250,000 in 1 Week by Focusing on the “Right” Customers
episodes.summary: For a very long time now, we’ve been thinking about offering a high-end coaching program in our house flipping education business.  And last week, it became a reality… but it only happened for a couple very specific reasons…

episodes.seriesTitle: 8 Minute Millionaire: Learn the Secrets of Millionaire Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: 63: Millionaire Interview: Nathan Latka, Founder of Heyo and “The Top” Podcast
episodes.summary: Today’s guest is the one and only Nathan Latka, founder of social media software company Heyo and host of the podcast “The Top!” Nathan has some incredible tips and insights to share… that could radically change your business!

episodes.seriesTitle: 8 Minute Millionaire: Learn the Secrets of Millionaire Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: 62: Just Keep Moving Forward: Breakthrough Session with Jason
episodes.summary: Today, we hold a breakthrough session with Jason Brorby, who recently sold a pizza restaurant that he owned and is ready for his next challenge. There’s just one problem… what’s that challenge going to be?

episodes.seriesTitle: 8 Minute Millionaire: Learn the Secrets of Millionaire Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: 61: Jenny Gets Chewed Out: Was That Softball Game Worth It?
episodes.summary: Tara here.  Last week, in episode 56, Justin and I talked to Jenny about some of the sacrifices she would need to make to support herself. But later that same day, just a couple hours after our call, something happened…

episodes.seriesTitle: 8 Minute Millionaire: Learn the Secrets of Millionaire Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: 60: How to Build an Email List (And Why Your Business’s Survival Depends On It)
episodes.summary: Your email list is perhaps the most important thing you can create and build if you want to grow your business… in fact, almost nothing else matters if you aren’t building a solid email list!  Here’s how to do it…

episodes.seriesTitle: 8 Minute Millionaire: Learn the Secrets of Millionaire Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: 59: The Curse of the Entrepreneur: When Business Takes Over Your Personal Life
episodes.summary: Hey!  Justin here.   :)  Ever since we launched 8 Minute Millionaire, I’ve started noticing something different about Tara… she’s been stricken with the curse of the entrepreneur!

episodes.seriesTitle: 8 Minute Millionaire: Learn the Secrets of Millionaire Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: 58: Up-And-Coming Millionaire: Derrick Williams, Entrepreneur & Mobile App Expert
episodes.summary: Instead of a millionaire, today we’re interviewing an up-and-coming millionaire… Justin’s brother Derrick Williams! Derrick has gone from stuck and unemployed to being financially free and able to live the life he wants to live… in a VERY short time…

episodes.seriesTitle: 8 Minute Millionaire: Learn the Secrets of Millionaire Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: 57: Face What You’re Avoiding: Breakthrough Session with Sarah
episodes.summary: Have you ever felt stuck in business or in your career and been unable to figure out why? Sometimes it's not a business obstacle that's holding us back... sometimes, it's something in our personal life that needs to be addressed...

episodes.seriesTitle: 8 Minute Millionaire: Learn the Secrets of Millionaire Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: 56: Jenny’s Finances: No More Support from Mom and Dad (Can She Do It?)
episodes.summary: Last week, Jenny chose to quit school… and she committed to her parents that she would no longer need their financial support by the end of one month. That’s a HUGE step for Jenny... but how is she going to pull it off?

episodes.seriesTitle: 8 Minute Millionaire: Learn the Secrets of Millionaire Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: 55: Where Should You Build Your Audience? How to Choose a Platform
episodes.summary: This week, we dive into one of the big questions many entrepreneurs are asking… where should I build my audience? In today’s episode, we introduce you to some of the biggest and most powerful platforms and help you get started with each!

episodes.seriesTitle: 8 Minute Millionaire: Learn the Secrets of Millionaire Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: 54: How to Get Big Things Done: Rip Your Schedule to Pieces
episodes.summary: For a while now, Justin has been working on writing a book… and it has been an interesting experience, to say the least!  In order to get anywhere on this project, Justin has had to manage his time a bit differently than usual…

episodes.seriesTitle: 8 Minute Millionaire: Learn the Secrets of Millionaire Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: 53: Millionaire Interview: Los Silva, Serial Entrepreneur and Online Business Expert
episodes.summary: Los Silva is an incredible entrepreneur who has launched and run many, many companies… and now he helps others do the same!  Get ready… we cover a TON of ground in this interview, and it’s all gold!

episodes.seriesTitle: 8 Minute Millionaire: Learn the Secrets of Millionaire Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: 52: Focus Will Make You Rich: Breakthrough Session with Boss
episodes.summary: Today, we held a breakthrough session with an awesome young man named Boss!  Boss is not afraid to put himself out there and has some amazing business skills… but there’s one thing he needs to do better if he wants to succeed…

episodes.seriesTitle: 8 Minute Millionaire: Learn the Secrets of Millionaire Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: 51: Jenny’s Decision: Drop Out of College or Stick With It? Here’s Her Answer…
episodes.summary: Last week, Justin got Jenny thinking about whether she should stay in school or drop out to pursue her millionaire journey full-time. She spent a while thinking about it… and in today’s episode, she shares her decision!

episodes.seriesTitle: 8 Minute Millionaire: Learn the Secrets of Millionaire Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: 50: How to Build an Audience (And Why Your Business Depends on It)
episodes.summary: What’s the big deal about building an “audience?”  Why do you need one, and how do you start creating it?  In this episode, we talk about why building an audience is so important to your business and show you how to do it!

episodes.seriesTitle: 8 Minute Millionaire: Learn the Secrets of Millionaire Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: 49: Feeling Stuck? Here’s Why (This is the 1 Thing Holding You Back)…
episodes.summary: It seems like a lot of people want to stay “stuck.” They SAY they want to change their life, but then they immediately start coming up with excuses for why they can’t. The truth is, there’s just 1 thing keeping you stuck… and here’s how to overcome it!

episodes.seriesTitle: 8 Minute Millionaire: Learn the Secrets of Millionaire Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: 48: Millionaire Interview: Gail Tolstoi-Miller, Networking and Recruiting Expert, Author, and Entrepreneur
episodes.summary: Love it or hate it, networking is a huge part of success, no matter what line of work you’re in.  On today’s episode, Gail Tolstoi-Miller shares her advice on how to build relationships with the people who can help you get where you want to go!

episodes.seriesTitle: 8 Minute Millionaire: Learn the Secrets of Millionaire Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: 47: Jenny Finally “Gets” It… But Now She Has to Make a HUGE Decision (And it Might Make You Angry)
episodes.summary: Buckle up… today’s episode is going to get exciting!  And you might come away shocked or even a bit angry after listening.  What we get into today is VERY controversial… and I’m not even going to say what it is!  Just listen!

episodes.seriesTitle: 8 Minute Millionaire: Learn the Secrets of Millionaire Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: 46: “I’m Not Even Tired:” Jenny Discovers the Secret to Marathon Training… and Runs for MILES!
episodes.summary: Hey everyone! Jenny here. Today’s episode is all about my training to run a marathon. Things have REALLY changed since I started running… and I’ve discovered something AMAZING…

episodes.seriesTitle: 8 Minute Millionaire: Learn the Secrets of Millionaire Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: 45: Marketing is Happening EVERYWHERE (And Here’s Why it Matters)…
episodes.summary: You know when you go to the grocery store to buy just a few items, but somehow you end up coming home with a bunch of cookies and snacks you didn’t really mean to get? That’s marketing at work. We are all constantly being influenced by marketers…

episodes.seriesTitle: 8 Minute Millionaire: Learn the Secrets of Millionaire Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: 44: Success is Messy: Justin and Tara Get Into 3 Fights in 1 Day
episodes.summary: Life is messy and imperfect… and no matter how successful you are, you’re still a messy, imperfect human being, and you always will be! When things go wrong, make changes, make amends, and just keep moving forward!

episodes.seriesTitle: 8 Minute Millionaire: Learn the Secrets of Millionaire Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: 43: Millionaire Interview: Laura Roeder, Social Media Consultant and Founder of Edgar
episodes.summary: There’s no question that social media plays a huge role in marketing today. The question is, what are you going to do about it? Laura Roeder, social media consultant and founder of the social management tool Edgar, has some great answers!

episodes.seriesTitle: 8 Minute Millionaire: Learn the Secrets of Millionaire Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: 42: Jenny’s Breakdown: If You Want to Succeed, You Need to CHANGE Something (Starting Now)
episodes.summary: After Jenny got back in touch with us following her “disappearance,” we knew something had to change… and we wanted to find out exactly why she had gone dark and what had happened.

episodes.seriesTitle: 8 Minute Millionaire: Learn the Secrets of Millionaire Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: 41: Jenny Stops Responding to Calls and Emails… And Disappears Completely
episodes.summary: Just when we were starting to feel like Jenny was ready for the next level… just as we were about to start giving her some bigger responsibilities… something happened. And it pretty much brought everything to a screeching halt…

episodes.seriesTitle: 8 Minute Millionaire: Learn the Secrets of Millionaire Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: 40: My Life as a Momtrepreneur: How to Run a Business as a Full-Time Parent
episodes.summary: Hey everyone! Tara here. I’m a mother and an entrepreneur, and honestly, it can be a huge challenge to balance family and business. Today, I dig into how I break up my time between taking care of the kids and getting work done...

episodes.seriesTitle: 8 Minute Millionaire: Learn the Secrets of Millionaire Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: 39: How to “Hack” the Learning Curve and Jump Ahead of 99% of Other People
episodes.summary: It’s absolutely possible to “hack” the learning curve and jump ahead of the vast majority of people… and in this episode, we show you how!

episodes.seriesTitle: 8 Minute Millionaire: Learn the Secrets of Millionaire Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: 38: Millionaire Interview: Justin Christianson, President of Conversion Fanatics and Optimization Expert
episodes.summary: Justin Christianson is one of the top experts on conversion rate optimization… and he takes us on a deep dive into how to actually get results from your marketing. Yeah, it’s kind of a big deal. If you’re running a business, you need to hear this!

episodes.seriesTitle: 8 Minute Millionaire: Learn the Secrets of Millionaire Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: 37: Don’t Know What to Do With Your Life? That’s Good (And Here’s Why)…
episodes.summary: “Jumping ship” to pursue what you’re passionate about isn’t easy. But it’s far worse to stick to a path you’re not happy with just because it’s the one you’ve always been on. So if you know you’re not where you want to be, here’s what to do...

episodes.seriesTitle: 8 Minute Millionaire: Learn the Secrets of Millionaire Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: 36: “I’m Getting Serious About This:” Jenny Pushes Herself to Stop Slacking... But Can She Do It?
episodes.summary: It’s time for another update on Jenny’s Million-Dollar Journey!  And things are getting exciting… just when we were starting to feel like things were taking a turn for the better… well, make sure to listen to the end of this episode to see what happens!

episodes.seriesTitle: 8 Minute Millionaire: Learn the Secrets of Millionaire Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: 35: Should You Go to College? Maybe, Maybe Not (Here’s How to Decide)…
episodes.summary: Should you go to college? That question has never been more important than it is today… and a lot of young people are making the wrong decision. But no matter where you are on your career journey, figuring this out is hugely important…

episodes.seriesTitle: 8 Minute Millionaire: Learn the Secrets of Millionaire Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: 34: You’re Giving Me Whiplash: Tara and Justin Disagree on How to Run the Company (And Tara Takes Over?!)
episodes.summary: Yesterday, Tara and I got into a heated debate about a few key things… and we ended up making a big change to how we run our businesses. Yeah… we don’t always agree on things!  Listen to the episode to find out what happened!

episodes.seriesTitle: 8 Minute Millionaire: Learn the Secrets of Millionaire Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: 33: Millionaire Interview: Brad Costanzo of Bacon Wrapped Business
episodes.summary: There are a million ways to make a million dollars… and in today’s episode, Brad Costanzo breaks down the many, many opportunities and business types out there. But how do you decide what type of business you should start? He has some tips on that, too…

episodes.seriesTitle: 8 Minute Millionaire: Learn the Secrets of Millionaire Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: 32: You Need to Do Less, Not More: Breakthrough Session with Najwa
episodes.summary: Today, I have the privilege of sharing a breakthrough session I recently held with an incredible woman named Najwa.  Najwa is no stranger to hard work… but she has seemingly too many ideas and projects and goals she wants to tackle.  Can you relate?

episodes.seriesTitle: 8 Minute Millionaire: Learn the Secrets of Millionaire Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: 31: “I Think I’ve Made a Huge Mistake:” Jenny Hits Some Major Roadblocks
episodes.summary: Jenny is now a couple weeks in to her journey working for and learning from Justin… and there have been some major ups and downs... mostly downs.  In this episode, we share a few clips capturing the craziness of the past couple weeks!

episodes.seriesTitle: 8 Minute Millionaire: Learn the Secrets of Millionaire Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: 30: Hold That Goal: The Trick to Creating New Habits That Will STICK Forever
episodes.summary: When it comes to forming new habits, there’s just one thing that many people get wrong… and in today’s episode, we show you how to do it RIGHT…

episodes.seriesTitle: 8 Minute Millionaire: Learn the Secrets of Millionaire Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: 29: Let’s Talk Numbers: $85,000 in 1 Month? Yep, It’s Possible…
episodes.summary: In today’s episode, we dig into some of the “numbers” for our two online businesses, 8 Minute Millionaire and House Flipping HQ.  What kind of numbers?  The good kind…

episodes.seriesTitle: 8 Minute Millionaire: Learn the Secrets of Millionaire Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: 28: Millionaire Interview: Tim Mai, From Refugee to Real Estate Tycoon
episodes.summary: Today I’m honored to have my good friend Tim Mai joining us on the podcast! Tim is an incredible person with an incredible “rags to riches” story. His insights on success are profound, heartfelt, and hard-won through decades of experience.

episodes.seriesTitle: 8 Minute Millionaire: Learn the Secrets of Millionaire Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: 27: Do the Small, Important, Scary Things: Breakthrough Session with Bridget
episodes.summary: Today, you get to listen in on a breakthrough session we held with Bridget, a new member of Justin’s house flipping coaching program. Bridget shares her story and we help her identify what’s holding her back and how to break through it!

episodes.seriesTitle: 8 Minute Millionaire: Learn the Secrets of Millionaire Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: 26: Does Jenny Have What it Takes? Her Family Members Get Brutally Honest…
episodes.summary: Before Jenny gets too far along in her journey, we’ve decided to interview a few of her family members to see what they think of this new direction she’s taking and whether she’ll be able to stick with it. Let’s just say they were brutally honest…

episodes.seriesTitle: 8 Minute Millionaire: Learn the Secrets of Millionaire Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: 25: 20 Life-Changing Books You Should Read (Or Listen To) Right Now
episodes.summary: Hey there! This is Tara. Justin is not a big fan of reading books. I, on the other hand, am a total book lover. But even Justin listens to good books on a regular basis… and today, we share with you a few of our favorites…

episodes.seriesTitle: 8 Minute Millionaire: Learn the Secrets of Millionaire Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: 24: How We’re Making Money Online Right Now (And How We Got Here)
episodes.summary: Today, we share what we’re up to with our online business right now… how we’re making money online, the struggles we’ve had, how we started building our online audience, and so on. It hasn’t been easy, that’s for sure…

episodes.seriesTitle: 8 Minute Millionaire: Learn the Secrets of Millionaire Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: 23: Millionaire Interview: Aaron Walker, Entrepreneur and Founder of 8 Businesses
episodes.summary: Meet 8-time entrepreneur Aaron Walker… a millionaire with 37 years of experience and a wealth of wisdom to share!  From growing up in a poor family to “retiring” at age 27, his story is incredible… and the lessons he’s learned along the way might just transform your life…

episodes.seriesTitle: 8 Minute Millionaire: Learn the Secrets of Millionaire Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: 22: Why the Smartest, Hardest Workers Don’t Make the Most Money (Hard Work Isn’t Enough)
episodes.summary: Last week, we had a meeting with Kyle and Jenny where we had to give some… constructive feedback to both of them. We decided to share this because what Kyle is struggling with is something all entrepreneurs face...

episodes.seriesTitle: 8 Minute Millionaire: Learn the Secrets of Millionaire Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: 21: Jenny’s First Day: Let’s Just Say She’s Not Off to a Good Start…
episodes.summary: Last week, in episode 16, Jenny had to make a huge decision… and she chose to accept Justin’s million-dollar offer!  But is she going to be able to stick with this?  Let’s just say things aren’t off to a good start…

episodes.seriesTitle: 8 Minute Millionaire: Learn the Secrets of Millionaire Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: 20: Why You HAVE to Believe in Yourself (And What to Do If You Don’t)…
episodes.summary: Whether or not you believe in yourself is one of the biggest determining factors that will influence your success.  But what if you honestly just DON’T believe in yourself?  What can you do?

episodes.seriesTitle: 8 Minute Millionaire: Learn the Secrets of Millionaire Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: 19: Why We Do What We Do: The Inspiration Behind 8 Minute Millionaire
episodes.summary: Last week, we talked a bit about our story and how we made our first $1,000,000… but what’s up with 8 Minute Millionaire?  Why are we doing this?  Today, we share the inspiration behind this podcast…

episodes.seriesTitle: 8 Minute Millionaire: Learn the Secrets of Millionaire Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: 18: Millionaire Interview: Russell Brunson, Funnel Master and Online Marketing Expert
episodes.summary: When it comes to making money online, Russell Brunson has done it all… and today he shares with us how to use funnels to make money online. He even walks us through one of his best-performing funnels to show us how it works!

episodes.seriesTitle: 8 Minute Millionaire: Learn the Secrets of Millionaire Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: 17: Why Struggles and Weaknesses Are Important (And How They Can HELP Us Grow)
episodes.summary: Recently, we talked about the primary question, and just after recording that podcast, I got a letter from someone close to me… and I want to share it with you, because I think what it says will hit home for MANY people…

episodes.seriesTitle: 8 Minute Millionaire: Learn the Secrets of Millionaire Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: 16: Jenny’s Decision: Make $1,000,000 in 5 Years… or Stay in Her Comfort Zone (And Do Nothing)
episodes.summary: Last week, in episode 11, Justin made Jenny a “million dollar proposal.”  He offered to mentor her for the next 5 years to help her change her life and become a millionaire.  Do you think she accepted the offer?  Check out today’s episode to see what happens!

episodes.seriesTitle: 8 Minute Millionaire: Learn the Secrets of Millionaire Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: 15: How the Answer to 1 Simple Question Can Change Your Life
episodes.summary: Today, we’re going to share with you one simple concept that, if you are able to grasp and adapt, it will change the way you think, act, and the success you have in all aspects of your life, forever…

episodes.seriesTitle: 8 Minute Millionaire: Learn the Secrets of Millionaire Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: 14: 9 Months Pregnant and Flat Broke: Our MAJOR Financial Turning Point...
episodes.summary: About 5 years ago, we were scrambling to find a way to pay the bills. Less than two years later, we made our first 7-figure income year. What happened in between?  A lot of hard work… and many ups and downs, changes, and times where we had to refocus…

episodes.seriesTitle: 8 Minute Millionaire: Learn the Secrets of Millionaire Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: 13: Millionaire Interview: Hal Elrod, Bestselling Author of “Miracle Morning”
episodes.summary: Today, we interview Hal Elrod—keynote speaker, business coach, and #1 bestselling author of the book Miracle Morning!  Hal shares the 6 things successful people do every morning… a ritual he says is the biggest factor in his success...

episodes.seriesTitle: 8 Minute Millionaire: Learn the Secrets of Millionaire Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: 12: Have You DECIDED to Become a Millionaire? (Yes, You Have a Choice to Make…)
episodes.summary: One of the most important steps on the road to becoming a millionaire is actually making the decision to become one.  Makes sense, right?  Success isn’t just handed to you.  You have to make the choice to pursue it… but how do you get started doing that?

episodes.seriesTitle: 8 Minute Millionaire: Learn the Secrets of Millionaire Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: 11: The Million-Dollar Proposal: Justin’s Offer to Jenny (Part 2)
episodes.summary: After Jenny’s call last week, Justin made her an offer… a crazy, incredible, insane offer… and now Jenny has to decide what to do.  Will she take Justin’s offer to change her life, or will she stay in her comfort zone?

episodes.seriesTitle: 8 Minute Millionaire: Learn the Secrets of Millionaire Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: 10: How to Succeed: Just Keep FAILING Until You Make It (Seriously)
episodes.summary: Everything you THINK you know about failure is wrong.  Yep, that’s right… you’ve been lied to.  Failure is not a “bad” thing.  It’s not something to get upset about.  And it’s not the “end” of your journey… unless you allow it to be…

episodes.seriesTitle: 8 Minute Millionaire: Learn the Secrets of Millionaire Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: 9: Tara’s Breakdown: I’m Not Hiding Anymore… (And It’s Scary)
episodes.summary: Hi there… Tara here. Launching this podcast has been nothing short of terrifying for me… and it has taken me WAY outside my comfort zone. Today, I share what I’ve been feeling over the past week… and I admit, I kind of broke down a little…

episodes.seriesTitle: 8 Minute Millionaire: Learn the Secrets of Millionaire Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: 8: Millionaire Interview: John Lee Dumas of Entrepreneur On Fire
episodes.summary: Today, we interview millionaire entrepreneur John Lee Dumas of Entrepreneur On Fire!  John is one of the most recognized names in online marketing and entrepreneurship… and he has some POWERFUL insights to share!

episodes.seriesTitle: 8 Minute Millionaire: Learn the Secrets of Millionaire Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: 7: If You Don’t Pay, You Don’t Pay Attention: Justin’s Offer to Jenny
episodes.summary: Justin’s sister Jenny called him up and asked to borrow some money.  Little did she know it would turn into a lesson on appreciating money (and the importance of paying interest)!

episodes.seriesTitle: 8 Minute Millionaire: Learn the Secrets of Millionaire Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: 6: How to Free Up Your Time: Cut These 5 Things Out of Your Life Today
episodes.summary: Do you feel like you never have enough time in the day to pursue your ideas and dreams?  Today’s episode is all about how to win back your time by cutting non-essential things out of your life.

episodes.seriesTitle: 8 Minute Millionaire: Learn the Secrets of Millionaire Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: 5: Who Are You Hanging Out With? (This is EXTREMELY Important...)
episodes.summary: For better or worse, the people we surround ourselves with shape us and influence our thoughts and actions.  So who are you hanging out with?

episodes.seriesTitle: 8 Minute Millionaire: Learn the Secrets of Millionaire Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: 4: From Satellite Dishes to Real Estate: How We Made Our First Million
episodes.summary: Our story is not what you’d expect… we’ve been through some major ups and downs!  From selling satellite dish service door-to-door to flipping houses, here’s how we made our first million…

episodes.seriesTitle: 8 Minute Millionaire: Learn the Secrets of Millionaire Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: 3: How to Find Out if You’re TRULY Passionate About Something (Hint: Just Start Doing It)
episodes.summary: You have to be passionate about what you want to do.  But not just a little passionate… you have to be passionate ENOUGH to take it beyond what you ever imagined… and what you THINK you’re passionate about may not be what you’re actually passionate about.

episodes.seriesTitle: 8 Minute Millionaire: Learn the Secrets of Millionaire Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: 2: 7 Character Traits You MUST Develop to Become a Millionaire
episodes.summary: Successful people tend to exhibit many of the same character traits.  This isn’t surprising… but what might surprise you is exactly which character traits these are.  In this episode, we explore 7 of the most important character traits needed for success!

episodes.seriesTitle: 8 Minute Millionaire: Learn the Secrets of Millionaire Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: 1: The Biggest Obstacle You’re Going to Face (You HAVE TO Defeat This to Succeed)
episodes.summary: Want to make a million dollars? There’s one HUGE obstacle standing in your way… and if you want to succeed, you absolutely MUST defeat it.

episodes.seriesTitle: 8 Minute Millionaire: Learn the Secrets of Millionaire Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: Intro: Welcome to 8 Minute Millionaire!
episodes.summary: Want to learn how to make a million dollars? 8 Minute Millionaire is all about developing the mindset of a millionaire, breaking through limiting beliefs and behaviors that hold you back, and learning how to take action to reach your first $1,000,000!  Welcome aboard!
